hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Carpenters' tent#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Song of Time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #6# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Green Potion Bottle# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Nayru's Love# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Impa's House#.
